channel.title: Physics on Food 4 Thought
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on Food 4 Thought

item.title: Family of Science
item.description: The Bohr Family Niels Bohr was a great practitioner of the Scientific method and inspired many physicists throughout his career such as Werner Heisenberg, Lev Landau, Wolfgang Pauli, Paul Dirac, just to name a few and undoubtedly continues to do so.

item.title: Great Minds
item.description: Fifth conference participants, 1927. Institut International de Physique Solvay in Leopold Park The great minds of the nineteenth-century meeting for the Nobel Committee meeting. This picture was taken by Benjamin Couprie at the Institute International de Physique Solvay, Leopold Park, Brussels Belgium.

item.title: The Infinite Universe
item.description: I believe that small though we are, insignificant though we may be, the human mind is capable of very very big things indeed.

item.title: Chaos
item.description: Lorenz Attractors Chaos And then people say physics is not poetic and beautiful. At first glance, this picture looks like a work of art( well technically it is art because itâ€™s a pictorial representation) but this is a graphical representation of a so-called Lorenz system of ordinary differential equations studied by E.
